metadata.Title: CVE-2021-21852 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Multiple exploitable integer overflow vulnerabilities exist within theMPEG-4 decoding functionality of the GPAC Project on Advanced Contentlibrary v1.0.1. A specially crafted MPEG-4 input at “stss” decoder cancause an integer overflow due to unchecked arithmetic resulting in aheap-based buffer overflow that causes memory corruption. An attacker canconvince a user to open a video to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: gpac package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
